Articles.Content:
Looking to make the airbrakes of these radial engine/fuel tank combo's have an actual effect for when in atmosphere. What plugin do I need to include and what .cfg parts do I need?

I imagine it's firespitter but I am not 100% sure

http://postimg.org/image/6x4t80r0t/

http://postimg.org/image/d2trkk3u7/
Yeah, firespitter does have the airbrake module called FSairBrake. I am not a modder, so I can't exactly tell you how the module work though, because I have no idea.

yah, firespitter addon is great and have very good documentation, worth checking out;

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1iD52DfHft04Hb48TEhF5a4n5JOc8efUevdg5Y_QPICQ/edit?pli=1

Thanks for the link riocrokite, here's the project I am working on

http://postimg.org/image/71w997v5f/

http://postimg.org/image/wdvvwcsdj/

http://postimg.org/image/56qqm6z2n/
I really like the look of these!
same here. what are going to be the parameters of the part/parts in question?
